title: Skins for IP
body: I think riot should make some skins available for IP. Im not saying all of them just some of the cheaper ones. There are a ton of games like LOL where u can buy skins for the points you can earn in game. Im thinking the cheaper skins maybe for even a ton of IP.

replies.body:
I don't want skins to be available for IP. Riot needs to eat, after all.

Now, chromas...

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/champion-mastery.html
This is as close as you're ever gonna get.
is that going on now? and if so how to i get to it
It's on PBE at the moment. It'll probably release in the spring or summer. Surrender at 20 has many updates on it.

While Riot probably wants this, Tencent doesn't.

https://youtu.be/qMxX-QOV9tI?t=1m1s

It also wouldn't be fair to those who supported Riot with RP. I like the Hextech crafting plan. You can have free skins, if you fucking work for them and get good at the game, and in limited quantities. That's more than fair, especially since skins are only cosmetic.
